name: Bug Free (Liioni)
description:
Project for a summer course 2021.

The player is stuck on a new planet and is trying to find the end of a cave, but it keeps growing and expanding.

As of right now it's two levels that gets switched between, but it's endless. (Except if you die, heh.)

There's a tutorial level that only gets played once, but it's possible to replay it in settings.

Keys: A & D for movement, Space/W for jumping and left mouse button to shoot.

Enjoy! :)

Programming and Art by Liioni

Background music obtained from http://teknoaxe.com/

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com
